memoDescription: Very Good. So to add more bubbles just add to the json files.
Information that was in the the bubbles are now in JSON files and are processed using javascript. So to add more bubbles just add to the json files.
Added a functional search bar that can be used to hide and show bubbles to all search bars.
Added a functional search bar that can be used to hide and show bubbles.
The project and tool page has been created. It includes a search bar but it is not functional at the moment. It has a flexible UI for mobile users or a smaller window.
The game page has been created. It includes a search bar but it is not functional at the moment. It has a flexible UI for mobile users or a smaller window.
The home page has been optimized. It has a flexible UI for mobile users or a smaller window.
The website has a profile page now. It has a flexible UI for mobile users or a smaller window.
The website has the home page with stuff that could be useful. This also is good practice for developing webpages.
